website_summaries.verdict: Simple and effective, these lifters not only free up space under the bed, but they do it at a great price.
pros: Engineered to be incredibly strong, these lifters are made of a composite black plastic polymer and can give your bed approximately 5.25 inches of lift
cons: Because of their wide base, these bed risers may leave a wide space between the wall and headboard

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS. We've had this for less than 3 months and at 5am this morning our bed went right through the post while my husband, myself, and our 10 month old were asleep in bed. Luckily no one was hurt. This was a great product since we live in a tiny apartment and space was necessary
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Ruescher

customer_reviews.title: THEY BROKE IN LESS THEN 12HOURS
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: still haven’t heard anything from the company and it looks like i won’t be receiving any type of refund or change. I brought a new set from a different company and they have been working amazing since. I put these beauty’s on yesterday and absolutely loved them. Right height and look for my room but this morning while getting ready for church i set on the end of my bed just to feel it fall through the block. I’m only 196 and not sure what happen. I would love a refunded or exchange. I have a dachshund and need my bed to be higher to protect his back when going after his toys.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Great for MORE than just BED use - Make your DESK Stand-Up Height!
customer_reviews.text: I use these bed risers for my Work/Table/DESK to make it the correct height for stand up use. Heard its much healthier that way. The casters of the table fit perfectly in the top cavity and the desk sits firm. I did not know the local Target carried this item, it is only $10.95 at Target, way overpriced at Amazon for $18.95. But I got em so too late to return now.
customer_reviews.author: GeekInVegas.Robert

customer_reviews.title: They were great at first
customer_reviews.text: They were great at first, but I guess one of them was faulty/weaker than the others and broke only a few months after I bought them. Maybe it was just defective?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the product! I'd buy them again.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a new King size bed and was not used to the lower height. I bought these bed risers and love getting in and out of bed without killing my back. They seem to be very sturdy so far, as I have two Great Danes that sleep on the bed and allow me to share their space. So it seems like the risers are holding up very well at this point. I would purchase more if these start to fail...I mean a lot of weight is put on these risers every day. Great product! I can also store my work boots underneath or a gallon of water for my VPAP machine. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: We were unable to use this product as unfortunately one of the risers broke. I do not completely blame this on the quality of the product because I was trying to assemble the risers, frame, and mattress by myself, so when I tried to place the mattress on top of everything, the frame slipped off of the riser and cracked one. I don't know if the risers would've served their intended purpose but feel they should have withstood this small mishap without breaking. This is why I've not rated storage capacity and rated sturdiness and stability at one star.
customer_reviews.author: A Peach

customer_reviews.title: What more could you want?
customer_reviews.text: I moved inta a new apartment, and it's great! I discovered after the fact that it sometimes may flood during heavy rainstorms. I did a lot of thinking about what to do, and finally decided since I do not have a lot of things that can be damaged by a few inches of water, why not lift the items that can? My washing machine, Refrigerator, bed and bedroom furniture are all sitting on top of these now. I saw these, and the rest is history. The added bonus? I'm pretty tall, so now things match up to my height much better! These are rock solid, super inexpensive, and gave me the exact results I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: JD Jones

customer_reviews.title: Work well and the cheapest I could find!
customer_reviews.text: Work great, and they were the cheapest I could find on Amazon or at Target. I had to order 3 sets because I have one of those cheap metal folding bed frames which unfortunately has a lot of legs (three rows of 4, 3, and 4 skinny metal legs). I was worried that the base of the risers would actually be too wide for the metal legs on my bed that are practically right next to each other in the middle, but they just fit! Would definitely recommend, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed but at least the cat's okay.
customer_reviews.text: I was hopeful. My son is 150lbs and has a twin bed. These only lasted a few months. He sat on the side of his bed and this happened. We removed everything out from under his bed and found his cat hiding under the bed. Thankfully she wasn't harmed.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: Makes a heck of a difference!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to raise a bathroom over-the-toilet shelf so that when the toilet lid opened it wouldn't bump the shelf and immediately close (scary for my boys). They were a bit larger than expected but it made them all that more stable and sturdy. I am so happy to have these risers. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: A. Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Workwell
customer_reviews.text: Well, i used it to raise a table, not a bed, so not sure I can review this for that. But they came fast and work very well. My table is quite heavy and they are easy on the floor. I'm not sure if I'll make new legs or this will be permanent, but the price was right and they work.
customer_reviews.author: L.E. Kimball

customer_reviews.title: Useful...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a storage solution, they are performing well in that aspect. Upon receiving and installing they did not strike me as the lasting kind. Would definitely buy something that is a lot more solid if you're looking for a lasting fix. Also, i haven't had them long enough to say how long they last (like other reviews state).
customer_reviews.author: Liz Lara

customer_reviews.title: Good, while it lasted I guess
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my dorm bed and they did work well... for like 2 weeks. One day, I (gently) sat on my bed and two of them broke instantly. They were so broken to the point that the leg of my bed had gone completely through the bed riser. It left a lot of broken plastic pieces everywhere. These were way to expensive to have broken so quickly. You can find perfectly good ones at Walmart for $5 that work waaay better. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Bernal

customer_reviews.title: They'll be great for adding storage, just don't put too much trust in them.
customer_reviews.text: They are by no means the sturdiest things in the world. They do the job to lift up the bed and make excellent under-bed space - but, I would definitely not recommend them for a bed that is used consistently. We have them in our guest bedroom where someone sleeps maybe once a month, and that's about as much as I trust them. I don't think they'll break, but they definitely slide around. They'll be great for adding storage, just don't put too much trust in them.
customer_reviews.author: MBH

customer_reviews.title: these "risers" worked great for both pieces of furniture and had no signs ...
customer_reviews.text: Post-surgery I need to raise my very low sofa and low bed; these "risers" worked great for both pieces of furniture and had no signs of wear and tear after 2 months of use. Only word of advice is to ensure the legs of the furniture will fit the top of the risers. I had no problems with my bed or sofa but it's best to check.
customer_reviews.author: MM215

customer_reviews.title: bed risers
customer_reviews.text: I have acid reflux and on those nights it is acting up I cough and cough, this along with medicine has eliminated those coughing fits at night. It takes a bit of getting used to CLIMBING into bed versus falling into bed, but it is worth it to sleep better. Not a problem with the risers just having to lift a bed to place under both legs, but we got it done, affordable price quick ship, everything I wanted and expected
customer_reviews.author: ZIPPER BOOKS

customer_reviews.title: The under bed storage with the first set is great. There is no movement even with frisky grandkids
customer_reviews.text: This was my second set of risers. The under bed storage with the first set is great. There is no movement even with frisky grandkids. The second set helped me raise a table to the height I needed for a cutting craft table. So much better in cost than purchasing another table. This is a great product and of course Amazon speedy shipping makes it a great experience all around.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Alice Hornsby

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to raise up my bed for storage. While attempting to adjust the mattress the risers tipped over and the whole bed fell. These may work better for hardwood or laminate floors but it is not very good on carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: Did not like this product at all and could almost consider it dangerous.... raised the bed nicely but was so wobbly that any movement on the bed would collapse the mattress to the floor... I would return them but unfortunately threw out the wrapping.. ... I would not recommend this product , very unstable....
customer_reviews.author: Jodi M. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Good for tables too!
customer_reviews.text: We actually bought them for our coffee table. Both my husband and I have shoulder issues and we would have to reach over to the table. These risers brought the table up perfectly. And my hubby was surprised at how stable they are.
customer_reviews.author: Florida gal

customer_reviews.title: A great product!  It just didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy product and added just the right amount of height. However I am one of the unfortunate few who has had bedbugs and I refuse to get a Boxspring because it's a perfect nest area. Thus my bed is a metal frame with 6 legs (the ones in the middle are very thick) and these DO NOT work for this setup. Not even if you bought 8 and used the other two for the center legs. I ended up returning this product at no fault to this producers of this item.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nifty yet Sublime
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, gives an extra ~6" of elevation. Makes it easier to get in and out of bed quietly without disturbing my partner AND provides extra storage space. The only downside is that they don't offer a 6-pack for queen and larger beds. I'm using the 2 extra risers as jack stands for my car (just kidding).
customer_reviews.author: Paul Pomes

customer_reviews.title: Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Work great! Blend in with my bedframe very well. I bought these in order to use the bed space as storage and to help with my back problems, so very excited.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlan Marie

customer_reviews.title: Talker is better
customer_reviews.text: We bought a better and larger mattress than what normally cones with a trundle bed. These lifters made it possible to easily fit under the upper bed. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: clenton collier

customer_reviews.title: They do the job
customer_reviews.text: They do the job. Creates under the bed space for storage in my small apartment. Might have been a little aggressive in ordering 5 inch risers 4 inch would have been perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Mickeyfinz

customer_reviews.title: Stronger than they look
customer_reviews.text: These risers are great. Previous risers stuck out from the bed and toes were caught on them many times. Not an issue with these. They were the perfect height to create storage, and held up well. They regularly held two adults, and sometimes a 60lb dog and 70 lb child on top of that.
customer_reviews.author: Hilary A

customer_reviews.title: Great way to raise the height of your bed.
customer_reviews.text: Our bedskirt was always needing adjusted because the bed was too close to the floor. These risers were the perfect solution to increase the height of the bed to adjust for the skirting. It also provided more room for storage under the bed. They seem very sturdy and durable. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did the job
customer_reviews.text: Purchase to raise my craft fair table height up so my displays would be eye level. Easy to use and very stable. They stack up for storage purposes and don’t take up too much room.
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: very sturdy, and very little wiggle in the table even ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to lift a 6 foot long craft table high enough to cut glass while in a standing position. Leaning over was causing a lot of back pain. These worked perfectly for me. Just high enough, very sturdy, and very little wiggle in the table even though it is on a carpeted floor (covered with plastic). The table was 30 inches tall, and is now 35 inches tall. Made a big difference in the pursuit of my hobby.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney B

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy! Everything they said they are
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I bought these a year ago and now ordering another pair for a different bed. So, after having these a year I’ve had no problems. They are everything they say they are. Sturdy and allowed plenty of storage for under the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Already three have broken. Disappointing purchase
customer_reviews.text: Three of the risers have already broken, and I only weigh 150 pounds. Removing and replacing them was a huge hassle. I am disappointed I bought these. I was hoping to solve a storage problem, but ended up with a riser problem as well.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: That they hold up my table
customer_reviews.text: It's what I wanted, but one of them is broken on the corner. To return them seems like a lot of work. My plan is to use them for lifting my dining room table when I want to mop, I don't like hitting my wooden table with the wet mop.
customer_reviews.author: KayGee

customer_reviews.title: Great risers
customer_reviews.text: Purchased an IKEA Bed and it was just a little to low on the floor. These brought the bed up to where I did not feel like I was crawling on my knees on the morning to get out. The only thing you need is a long enough comforter to cover the pieces because they are bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Lebruno

customer_reviews.title: Just the rigjt size
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 3 packs of these to raise our beds tall enough fot storage underneath. These give just enough extra height to create storage without meking the beds too tall.
customer_reviews.author: CRISTIN BARNA

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and increase under bed storage.
customer_reviews.text: These risers are very sturdy and safe. The risers have an indentation on the top for the bed frame legs to sit down into and a large base so no worries about the bed moving off of the units. I also appreciated how tall they were, I don’t see the point in using risers for more under bed storage if they don’t give you a substantial amount of room.
customer_reviews.author: Poopsie

customer_reviews.title: Well made bed risers.
customer_reviews.text: Delivered quickly and the price was good. My dog likes to go under the bed so I needed it raised. The risers are very sturdy so I have no fear of them cracking.
customer_reviews.author: C. J. Streckewald

customer_reviews.title: Works good on dirt surfaces !
customer_reviews.text: I need to raise my garden bench so it was easier to stand up from. Wide and sturdy and works good on dirt surface!
customer_reviews.author: MARK R.

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Well made. They are bigger at base than I thought they would be. No problem with that, just read the size. I would buy again if I was ever in the need for them.
customer_reviews.author: James D Watson

customer_reviews.title: Pretty "fun" waking up to a loud cracking sound one ...
customer_reviews.text: After using these for a few months, I've had to replace 3 out of the 4 with new ones. They crack under pressure, even when the weight on the bed does not exceed capacity (not even close). Pretty "fun" waking up to a loud cracking sound one corner of your bed falling to the floor...not.
customer_reviews.author: K.N.

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: I needed to raise my craft table. These were very easy to install, and they are the perfect height.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I have a king size bed and my frame was too low to the floor. I wanted to be able to store things under it, so I got these to raise the bed and make it possible to store things. They worked great and has done so now for about a week with no issues!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: base is too large
customer_reviews.text: this product is fine for those with no space issues. however, the base was too large to fit between the edge of our room size carpet and the baseboard, so back they went. we found a narrower lift on Amazon, all wood, a better fit all around
customer_reviews.author: McLean-ite

customer_reviews.title: Gives extra storage
customer_reviews.text: These worked great on my daughters bed in her apartment. She previously had 2 inch risers. After we put these on instead we were able to have a much bigger space for storage. We ordered 2 sets since 1 riser is needed in the middle of the queen bed for support.
customer_reviews.author: Rudy's mom

customer_reviews.title: They hold my heavy table up
customer_reviews.text: For quilting needs, I wanted to lift my old cherry table higher but it was very heavy. These hold it very steady, very easy to put under the table (with assistance if possible) and the table is steady for all my fabric maneuvering.
customer_reviews.author: rayjay

customer_reviews.title: Did the job to raise my table!
customer_reviews.text: These risers were just wet I needed to make my work table higher in order to stand and not hurt my back. They were sturdy and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Mokabean

customer_reviews.title: Broke
customer_reviews.text: Broke with approximately 200 pounds of people on a 30 pound couch that seats 3 people. They don't function.
customer_reviews.author: Ad Du

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty and good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfect for us, I ordered a total of 4 sets. They are heavy duty and they raise the bed enough for good storage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and stable
customer_reviews.text: Elevated the guest bed to store things under. Works great. Our bed has wheels and it fit perfect
customer_reviews.author: Tara V.

customer_reviews.title: They are nice, heavy quality and seem sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I needed extra storage space under my bed and decided on these. They are nice, heavy quality and seem sturdy. My only complaint is that my bed frame has round plastic/rubbery "feet" and I had to force them into the opening at the top. I was able to get them to fit and so far so good. Adds a nice height to my bed and I'm able to store seasonal clothing under my bed.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Great product and very useful
customer_reviews.text: these are great as we needed to raise a cabinet up about 6". Sturdy and look great.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: You may be in for a rolled out of bed wakeup
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made. The bed I placed on it is a full with a lightweight frame and the divot where the bed's legs sit broke within a month.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Work great. Makes it much easier for elderly mother to get out of bed.
customer_reviews.text: Work real well. I purchased another brand that broke when I sat on the corner of the bed. These seem to be stronger but we'll see. These make it much easier for my elderly mother to get out of bed. Don't know why I didn't get these sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Amazing extra storage and what a view I have!  I can lay in bed and look out the window!
customer_reviews.text: Super strong...so easy to install...and what an amazing difference! I can store my plastic bins under the bed. My elevated bed affords a view out my window to the pasture! Incredibly gogeous way to wake up in the morn! Mahalo nu nui
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. They raised the bed by the minimum 5 inches advertised and have held my heavy self on the bed every night so far... I didnt jump on the bed to test instantaneous force, but I dont plan on jumping on my bed like a 5 year old.
customer_reviews.author: D.McReynolds

customer_reviews.title: good replacements!
customer_reviews.text: When the bed fell, I had to replace the risers at the bottom! Getting the legs and casters our from the holes they'd broken through the tops of the old ones was quite the piece of work! These replaced them perfectly and all seems sturdy now Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine in Vermont

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install.  Works as intended
customer_reviews.text: Doctor recommended risers for a reflux issue. Easy to install, but it would be nice if it came with diff height one for the middle rail on a queen frame. I put a couple of books under the middle one and now it works great.
customer_reviews.author: wdchongjr

customer_reviews.title: This product is great.  Very sturdy, easy to use and I am actually sleeping better.
customer_reviews.text: I read in a health article that if you raise the head of your bed, you would get a better nights sleep. It actually did work.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Well-made
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy with a wide base, which is excellent. I'm using them for an animal habitat that I wanted off the ground, so I can't speak to how strong they are holding a bed but I wouldn't hesitate to use them for that purpose as well. They seem to be very durable and look nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bed risers rise to the occasion
customer_reviews.text: My mother is having difficulty walking, getting up from a seated position, etc. Her sofa was too low for her to stand up without rocking back and forth, and she often sat back down when she could not gain her balance. We ordered the bed risers and placed them under each sofa leg, and . . . success! With the additional height, she can stand up much easier. We are very pleased with the risers and recommend them for others who need to raise the height of their sofas.
customer_reviews.author: Texanne

customer_reviews.title: Did what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Not really much you can say about bed risers, either they are good quality or not. These are very sturdy. Needed 3 of them to raise the head of a king bed and they are plenty strong for that.
customer_reviews.author: R. Roll

customer_reviews.title: Great risers for my low TV stand
customer_reviews.text: Bought these risers to make room for my Home theater speakers and amplifier to fit underneath. Holds the stand firmly and does not wobble at all. Serves my purpose very well. Just the right height setting for me. If someone needs to raise their TV stand or entertainment centers to make room, I would definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Kapil M.

customer_reviews.title: Worked well
customer_reviews.text: I used them to raise the height of a headboard that isn't attached to a bed frame. They worked well and were large enough to securely hold the wooden legs. Check the dimensions of what you want to raise.
customer_reviews.author: Energy Saver

customer_reviews.title: NOT STABLE!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought to raise my bed. Just got these, installed 2 nights ago. NOT STABLE!!! Im afraid to lean on my bed to put my shoes on. Was able to get in and out of bed safely... Probably going to return.
customer_reviews.author: Purplesaxaphones

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and adds height
customer_reviews.text: We use these to add height to 6 foot long folding tables. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: EKS

customer_reviews.title: Everyone needs this
customer_reviews.text: Now I need a 3 inch set. Perfect for dorms.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Raise the Bed
customer_reviews.text: Bed raisers ! What can I say ? We use them too raise up craft tables . Work very well and very stable .
customer_reviews.author: A. Armfield

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Worked great on our bed, raised it very high. Don't recommend for pregnant woman or if you have dogs that sleep in the bed because of how tall it will make the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Kuskiko

customer_reviews.title: Work Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Work exactly like they're supposed to. Simple, easy two minute install.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Kemp

customer_reviews.title: I’m happy I bought these !
customer_reviews.text: Yes perfect but for lifting my bed higher and creating more room for storage I haven’t had any problems so far no lifting leaning rocking perfectly balanced and doing what’s needed
customer_reviews.author: JoIndi

customer_reviews.title: I bought the Home it bed risers,
customer_reviews.text: It is hard for seniors to install. The problem I had with the Home-it 5 to 6 inch bed risers. On one the bottom part on a section broke off when I was installing them. Just the other night. the center blew out with a large bang! while I was sleeping. I have to make another order to replace the broken ones. It seems they are warranted for only a month. I purchased in Oct.30, 2018
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well-made and doing the job well
customer_reviews.text: This inexpensive product is doing the trick for me. I used two of them to raise the head of my bed to help with my acid reflux. They seem to be sturdy and working just fine. I only gave 4 stars because how can you "love" bed risers :) ...
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Y.

customer_reviews.title: Simple health solution
customer_reviews.text: I have Gastro Esophagal Reflux Disorder and my doctor suggested bed raisers for the head of my bed so that I am on an incline. This has made a HUGE difference in my health. No longer do I have any issues with acid creeping up my throat while I try to sleep. Simple solution! These are heavy duty plastic and work just fine.
customer_reviews.author: isolotus

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy in deed
customer_reviews.text: This is very well made very sturdy as was advertised and makes for a good raise up a chair or your bed base I gave it three stars because it could have been more narrow or squared so it can fit better into a small space.
customer_reviews.author: Freedgrl33

customer_reviews.title: 6 inch Bed Risers
customer_reviews.text: My package was delivered quickly and they were easy to put in place.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana

customer_reviews.title: Extremely sturdy. The bed sits high on these
customer_reviews.text: Extremely sturdy. The bed sits high on these. I love them. Bear in mind, if you have a King size bed with two center supports in the center framework of the bed frame (i.e., two twin size box springs support the mattress) you will need to buy two sets of these so you have six. I bought only four the first time, forgetting the two in the middle and center of the bed frame. Then I ordered another set, for a total of six (with two left over.) I'm selling them for $5. :)
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Bahn

customer_reviews.title: Get them!
customer_reviews.text: Can store quite a lot of stuff and lifts the bed up a good amount. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kaiden

customer_reviews.title: These are incredibly sturdy and high enough for my laundry basket and totes ...
customer_reviews.text: These are incredibly sturdy and high enough for my laundry basket and totes to go under my bed. I suggest you measure what you want to go under your bed first to make sure these will suit your needs though. And a suggestion for putting them under your bed frame is take your mattress and box spring off the frame and then put them under because then you can see where they are going and that they are in the right place. This is an awesome product and did just what I needed!
customer_reviews.author: Witney Lonseth

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, very stable
customer_reviews.text: These are not flimsy, they are very stable underneath my queen size box spring and Tempurpedic mattress. I wish I bought the taller ones, but was concerned about stability. I would buy the taller ones next time. Absolutely fantastic product, and I can finally use the underneath side of my bed for storage boxes.
customer_reviews.author: missmaddie

customer_reviews.title: they have a use
customer_reviews.text: They do the job but the bed can feel unstable on top of them - Great for chairs to give height for folks who have a hard time sitting/standing and don't mind that they aren't decorative.
customer_reviews.author: NanaJo

customer_reviews.title: The perfect solution
customer_reviews.text: They are the perfect solution for raising my cutting table to the right height for me. Glad we found them. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Joy Delgado

customer_reviews.title: I worked perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what needed and I can see they will last forever!
customer_reviews.author: GOK

customer_reviews.title: I really am satisfied with them
customer_reviews.text: Theses bed risers boosted up my bed. I really am satisfied with them. If It wasn't for Amazon I don't know where else to look. Thank you Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Started the crap out of me
customer_reviews.text: Two weeks short of a year of use, and one of my bed legs punched right through while I was sitting on the bed. Started the crap out of me, but at least no one was hurt and the frame wasn't broken.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Not at all meant to last! Broke after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy; pay a little more for the aluminum risers. These broke after 4 months. I had to order 2 sets for our king bed. Plastic seemed durable when you unpack them, but 3 of the bed risers cracked and bottomed out during the middle of the night. Rude awakening.
customer_reviews.author: M. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Misleading
customer_reviews.text: This is not height adjustable. When they call it 5 to 6 inches, one tends to infer it is adjustable and adjustable risers are available in this price range
customer_reviews.author: George O

customer_reviews.title: Works well, should probably buy two.
customer_reviews.text: Works really well, but if you have a queen or king sized bed, I would recommend getting two sets. Didn't realize how much the middle was sinking til I bought a second set! Yes you'll have extra, but then you have replacements if they ever break.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlei

customer_reviews.title: They work quite well.
customer_reviews.text: I have used these for many years. They hold up well and are sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: D. Canham

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and a great height!
customer_reviews.text: These bed raisers are great! They were the perfect hight so I could slide totes under my bed. It gave me a lot more storage. I feel that they are very sturdy and stay in place. I also bought a set for my sons bed and they have worked great even with him jumping and playing around.
customer_reviews.author: Nicky

customer_reviews.title: ... for over a week so far and they are sturdy and functional
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for over a week so far and they are sturdy and functional. The quality is great and have held up well with 200 pounds in the bed. I would purchases again.
customer_reviews.author: Shaj

customer_reviews.title: They seem to be very sturdy but I am using 2 sets for my 8 ...
customer_reviews.text: These were exactly what I needed. They seem to be very sturdy but I am using 2 sets for my 8 leg platform bed. My mattress is a very thick and heavy memory foam mattress so I was concerned but so far these lifters seem to be holing up well.
customer_reviews.author: quippers

customer_reviews.title: Seem strong & light weight, EZ to install.
customer_reviews.text: Worked as they should, strong, light weight, but felt after some use that they were too high and removed them, my bed has two more legs in the center that I didn't take into count, used a floor jack to raise the bed. like the additional space under the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Yme

customer_reviews.title: and I am overall very pleased with them
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what I wanted, and I am overall very pleased with them. The only issue I have is that my bed (which has six legs) has broken two of them. The center legs bear more weight and have broken through the thick plastic. However, this could be due to my bed, and the plastic is very sturdy and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe

customer_reviews.title: Bed Risers used to minimize my back pain.
customer_reviews.text: These solved my problem of having a sewing table that was too low and I had back pain leaning over it. These 4 little things have made my sewing projects much less painless and more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Tattum

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Broke within a week. Couldn’t stand the weight of our 14 year old son. Do not recommend and do not want to go through the hassle of a return.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Bed Risers
customer_reviews.text: Only needed 2 but came in quantity of 4. Need for top part of bed frame to help with acid reflux.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Sadie

customer_reviews.title: dangerous
customer_reviews.text: the kids keep knocking their beds off these. Already broke one bed-frame.
customer_reviews.author: Mama X

customer_reviews.title: Risers work good
customer_reviews.text: We got a new bed for our grandson and it was a bit low. These risers fit perfectly and raised the bed about 5 inches.
customer_reviews.author: Fidel L.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Added lots of storage space under my bed. It is really sturdy and I have had no problems with these so far. Will leave a review after some months on how they are faring.
customer_reviews.author: Mad Physicist

customer_reviews.title: Makes it a snap to hide a body under your bed
customer_reviews.text: Believe it or not, we bought these so that we could keep a dead body under the bed. Not a real dead body, but the life size skeleton we have for Halloween. I just didn't feel right keeping him in the garden shed any longer so we just raised the bed in the guest room. Bottom line here is, if you can't stuff a dead body under the bed then you NEED these. Serious, buy them. Go ahead.
customer_reviews.author: Rodger

customer_reviews.title: Not too stable
customer_reviews.text: Tried to put my bed up on these, but the legs kept slipping off. Perhaps it's just because my bed is so close to the wall or the hardwood floor my bed is on, but I'm sticking with my round bed raisers that have worked for years.
customer_reviews.author: Mistress Rebecca

product_meta.title: Home-it 5 to 6-inch SUPER QUALITY Black bed risers, helps you storage under the bed 4-pack (Black)
product_meta.description: Color:(Black)Bed raisers are an amazing way to gain approximately 6-inches of storage space (in that ever so important unused space under the bed). They are also great for medical use, two under the front of the bed can help improve circulation in the legs, or two under the back legs can help people with acid reflux. These bed risers give you storage space you never had before. These sturdy blocks instantly elevate your bed for up to 6-Inch of additional under-bed storage space, perfect for those extra large storage bins. They are engineered to be incredibly strong, and can also be used to aid in the treatment of some medical conditions. These bed risers are perfect for any dorm room setting.
feature_bullets: Bed risers may be stacked together when not in use
Adds additional 5.25-inches of height to your bed
Made of durable high impact resistant composite plastic polymer
May be conveniently used on virtually any type of bed, includes 1-inch lip to keep bed post or caster securely in place
the bed lifters is excelent for a platform bed
